name: Silver + Trillion CZ Earrings
description:
Sterling silver flower earrings with prong-set CZ trillions with either  hammered or satin-finish. Lightly oxidized. Flower shapes measure approximately 5/8". 

Sterling silver, peridot.

Hand-fabricated. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

Free shipping through Dec. 15th!

name: Tube Set Topaz and Peridot Earrings
description:
Lightly textured and oxidized fine silver with semi-precious stones measure approximately 3/4" across. 

On left - Oxidized Fine Silver & Sterling flowers set off with Peridot stones. Sterling silver ear wires.

On Right- The ancient Korean technique, Keum Boo, which bonds 23k Gold to fine silver is used in these earrings which are then oxidized to contrast the gold.  Tube set White Topaz adds more sparkle. 3 gold-filed beads accent the ear wires.

Hand-fabricated. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Pearls Pearls Pearls
description:
An ancient Korean process,Keum-boo, is used to fuse 23k gold to fine silver in each of these settings.

Left - Oxidized fine silver & 23k gold triangles set off these  beautiful button pearls with a textured and oxidized leaf attached. 1" overall length.

Middle - Seated in  triangles of fine silver and 23k gold, these freshwater, cultured pearls have great luster and depth.  Pearls vary slightly in color and size. Ear wires and bead are 14k gold-filled. 1" overall length.

Right- fine silver and 23k gold triangular cap with pearl drops. Overall length- .75"

Fine silver, 23k gold, 14k gold-filled, freshwater cultured pearls A-grade.

Hand-fabricated. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Bronze Cuff
description:
The perfect "wear it everyday" cuff in bronze with undulating roll-printed lines. Matte finish that is lightly oxidized.

Bronze.

Hand-fabricated. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

Free shipping through Dec. 15th!

name: Meditation Bracelet
description:
From the Sticks and Stones Collection, this hand-forged and oxidized copper bracelet features a stack of two river rocks. Calming to look at, calming to wear. A veritable small sculpture. 

Inside cuff dimensions: 2.25" wide x 2" tall. River rock stack is .625" high.

Hand fabricated. One of a kind.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Chunky Bronze Cuff
description:
This roll printed and forged 2" wide cuff features a riveted and raised horse head medallion with at cubic zirconia eye. The matte finish is lightly oxidized. It's a hefty piece of bronze!

Cuff diameter is 2".

Bronze, cubic zirconia

Hand fabricated. One of a kind.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Hare Pairs + Leaves
description:
Hare Pairs are oxidized bronze (leaves) and vintage brass (rabbits). Overall length is 1.875". One pair has rabbits with one leaf, the other is rabbits with two leaves per earring. Limited Edition Series. 
Leaves only in oxidized bronze. Your choice! Pricing varies.

Hand-fabricated. 

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Eide

name: Giddyup!
description:
This copper horse with a CZ eye is tab-set in a copper bezel. 22" dark brown suede cord with an S-hook closure embellished with two tail-like leaves. Medallion is molded in-house from an 1800's vintage bronze pendant and measures 1" in diameter.

Copper, bronze, suede.

Hand fabricated medallion. One of a kind.

© 2013 Karen Chrisitine Eide

name: Bronze Triangles
description:
Lightly textured bronze with fresh water pearls are 2" in length (left) or 1.5" roll-printed bronze earrings (right). Buy both pairs and mix-and-match!

Hand-fabricated. 

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Sterling Silver Charm Necklace
description:
20" of handmade sterling charms, tube beads and black vintage glass beads. Imagery is recurrent throughout K. Eide's painting and metalwork. Lobster clasp closure. Charmed, I'm sure!

Sterling silver, vintage glass beads.

Hand-fabricated. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a  black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Sterling Flower Ring
description:
A sterling flower is set up off the incised band with a bead. Lightly oxidized. Size 7.5.

Sterling silver.

Hand fabricated medallion. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

name: Silver Triangles
description:

name: These Ain't Yo Mama's Pearls
description:
Vintage mother of pearl brooch is the focal point of this feminine 20" necklace that also adjusts to 18".  Can be worn on necklace or as a brooch. (See detail) Flower measures approximately 2". Black tie or jeans, summer or winter.

Mother of pearl, freshwater pearls, sterling silver lobster clasp. 

Vintage items are not polished or altered. They often show signs of wear and oxidation, which adds to their appeal.

Hand-fabricated with vintage element.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

name: Vintage Honey Bee's New Home
description:
This vintage honey bee pin of amber and sterling silver has a new life amongst shimmering silver leaves in an 18" necklace. Bee can also be removed from the chain to wear as a pin and measures 1.25" wide x 1" length. Lobster clasp closure. Bee is in excellent condition.

Fine silver, 14k gold-filled, sterling silver, jade.

Hand-fabricated with vintage pendant. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Vintage Owlie
description:
This vintage jade owl pendant, found in a Virginia antique store, now hides amongst  handmade fine silver and 23k gold leaves (keum boo)  suspended from two stacked river rocks. Closes with a lobster clasp. Owls have long been a source of inspiration - see the 40 x 40" encaustic painting of mine below. (available) Chain length can be changed upon request.

34" necklace (overall length. Chain is 28")

Fine silver, 23k gold, sterling silver, jade

Hand-fabricated with vintage pendant. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Falling Leaves
description:
Hot off the bench and I have to say I like them so much I'm going to do a limited edition series - all different. Made of fine silver and sterling silver with a triangular "cap" or 6 hand-formed leaves with a roll printed texture on them. Matte finish. Overall length is approx. 1.75". 

Fine Silver, sterling silver.

Hand fabricated. Limited Edition Series.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Eide

name: Silver Horse on Silk Ribbon
description:
1" wide sterling silver horse pendant with a cubic zirconia eye is mold-formed in-house. (The mold was made from a late 1800"s pendant) Hangs on a black silk ribbon highlighted with black vintage glass beads and adjusts from 20" to 30" . 

Hand-fabricated. 

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Eide

name: Sterling + Steel Bird Necklace
description:
This pierced bird, in fine silver, is fused to oxidized steel, with eight dangling sterling sticks. The bird pendant hangs on a hand forged sterling chain and is connected with oxidized links for contrast. Necklace length is 18". Pendant measures .875" x 1.25". Finished with wax to prevent rust and tarnish.

Hand-fabricated. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Keepsake
description:
Vintage horse show medal and cruelty-free horse hair pendant with bronze cap hang on a 30" chain. Closes with toggle clasp. Back of pendant is engraved with winning horse name etc. [see detail] 

Vintage items are not polished or altered. They often show signs of wear and oxidation, which adds to their appeal.

[Commissions accepted with your horse's hair]

Bronze, horse hair, metal.

description:

A. Forged and twisted steel & bronze SOLD
B. Forged bronze, sterling &14k gold SOLD
C. Forged and twisted steel (2) and bronze

description:

name: The Elephant & the Bee
description:
The bezel-set image under domed glass is from Karen's best selling series of paintings - Lucy's Bee's. The entire painting, "Bee Fence III",  is pictured below. The painting series is inspired by researcher Lucy King's discovery that because elephants are deathly afraid of bees, bee houses could be hung from farmers fence posts to keep them  from trampling farmers crops. 36" length.

Glass domed pendant measures 1.625".

Bronze, vintage glass beads, glass dome, fine art reproduction.

Hand fabricated. One of a kind.

Image from K. Eide original painting "Bee Fence III" (see detail)

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: Pearl + Keum-Boo Ring
description:
This pearl sits on a patterned, triangle of silver and is raised off the forged band with a gold bead. An ancient Korean gilding technique, Keum-boo, is used to gild the gold to the fine silver. Size 7.5.

Please note: due to pearls lack of hardness, this ring should be worn for special occasions and is not recommended for everyday wear. Pearls fall 3.5-4 on the Moh's hardness scale - with 10 being the hardest.

Fine silver, Sterling silver, 23k gold, 14k gold, freshwater pearl.

Hand fabricated. One of a kind.

All items come packaged with in a box with satin ribbon.

© 2013 Karen Christine Eide

name: 36"  Horse & Boots Necklace
description:
Made to look vintage, this weighty bronze horse medallion has a cubic zirconia eye with a double chain that has a 2" "tail" with cowboy boot charms. Wear the tail down your back or pull to the side to be visible from the front. Giddy-up!

Bronze, vintage glass beads, cubic zirconia.

Hand fabricated medallion. One of a kind.

© 2013 Karen Eide

name: 36" Red Bird Necklace
description:
The bronze, bezel-set  image Is  a fine art reproduction of a photo montage featuring the red bird from K. Eide's painting "From Where I Sit". Reverse side features a hand pierced design with textured and oxidized copper showing through. Tiny leaves hang from the pendant and chain. Closes with a toggle clasp and has a 3" "tail" with leaves.  36" length. 

Glass domed pendant measures 1.5".

Brass, sterling silver, copper,  fine art reproduction.

Hand-fabricated. One of a kind.

All items come packaged in a black box with satin ribbon.
